data.actual_result: Keyboard, even wrong one, is shown without having focus on the notes. Keyboard is overlaying user profile partly (not wanted)
data.expected_result: Keyboard is not shown since user notes has not been focused
data.short_description: (Wrong) Keyboard still open in user profile (not wanted and not focused on notes)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Keyboard- Hold down screen over user to open up menu- Click User Settings- Click Profile
